Field.name: description
Field.Value: Identity, family, and preferred communication details.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: Capture family names and demographics to power personal touches and statements.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: Upload or remove the member's profile picture.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: Envelope numbers are assigned per individual, not per family.

Field.name: description
Field.Value: Manage family associations for this member. A member can belong to multiple families but only one can be their primary.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: Member's mailing address. This will auto-fill when you select a primary family.

Field.Value: Emergency contacts and physician information. Pastoral notes and care plans are managed in the Care Plans module.

Field.Value: Serving assignments and leadership development notes.

Field.name: description
Field.Value: Faith background, baptism information, and personal testimony.

Field.Value: Information about the member's spiritual journey and denominational background.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: Approximate date when the member accepted Christ.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: If the member came from a different denomination.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: Name of the pastor or minister who performed the baptism.

Field.name: helperText
Field.Value: The member's personal testimony of faith.
